pullrequest.title: Fix more collada loader transparency calculation

content.raw: ya turns out that collada spec says <transparency> of 1.0 means fully opaque. I think we could just remove the <transparency> tag from the cordless drill model. Our current collada loader will output the correct results if both <transparent opaque="xxx"> and <transparency> tags are specified but if only <transparency> exists it'll revert to 0.0.
content.html: ya turns out that collada spec says <transparency> of 1.0 means fully opaque. I think we could just remove the <transparency> tag from the cordless drill model. Our current collada loader will output the correct results if both <transparent opaque="xxx"> and <transparency> tags are specified but if only <transparency> exists it'll revert to 0.0.
